Description.Text: Lotte City Hotel Tashkent Palace is a luxurious 4-star property offering elegant accommodation in the heart of Tashkent. Highlights include an outdoor swimming pool, sauna, multiple restaurants, beauty salon, Wi-Fi and parking. Tashkent is a cosmopolitan city known for its Soviet-era architecture and numerous museums. Nearby places of interest include the Alisher Navoi Opera and Ballet Theatre, the Amir Timur Monument and the Museum of Applied Arts. Mustakillik Maydoni metro station is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Tashkent destinations. The hotel occupies a grand mid-rise property with a neo-classical facade and elegant interior. Facilities include an outdoor swimming pool, gym and sauna. A range of massages, beauty and spa treatments are available on request. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Deluxe rooms are 27sqm and decorated in a bright, classic style with dark wood furniture. They feature a private balcony. Amenities include a satellite TV, safe, soundproofing, mini-bar, tea and coffee equipment, chargeable wired internet and en-suite bathroom. The Tashkent restaurant offers regional and international dishes in a sleek and friendly setting. The Shark Yulduzi restaurant offers elegant cuisine and al-fresco dining. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the stylish hotel bar. Free parking is possible onsite. The hotel provides 24-hour reception and room service and offers a chargeable airport shuttle service.
